BackFixedBar.name: Fixed Bar Back Stretch
BackFixedBar.preparation: Stand facing stationary bar. Grasp stationary bar with one hand approximately waist height.
BackFixedBar.execution: Bend over allowing hips to fall back. Slightly lean torso toward stretched arm. Hold stretch. Repeat with opposite side.
BackFixedBar.other: latissimusdorsi, deltoidposterior, infraspinatus, teresmajor, rhomboids, trapeziuslower, teresminor

BackPCCrossHand.name: Lever Back Stretch
BackPCCrossHand.preparation: Sit on seat in forward position with lower legs on shin pad, feet on foot rest. Place hands through wrist straps. Hold upper bar with arms crossed, overhand grip.
BackPCCrossHand.execution: Push and lower seat back. Hold stretch. Repeat with opposite arm position.
BackPCCrossHand.comments: To intensify stretch, look up or to one side.
BackPCCrossHand.other: latissimusdorsi, infraspinatus, deltoidposterior, teresmajor, erectorspinae, trapeziuslower, teresminor, rhomboids
